meanings.definition: The top or end of a barrel.
meanings.sent1: The barrelhead was securely sealed to keep the contents fresh.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure to check the barrelhead for any signs of damage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the barrelhead was a perfect spot to hide its acorns.
meanings.sent4: As the storm raged on, raindrops drummed loudly on the barrelhead.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight gleamed off the smooth surface of the barrelhead.

meanings.definition: A person who is the leader or head of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The barrelhead of the team always made fair decisions.
meanings.sent2: The company's barrelhead guided the employees with wisdom and vision.
meanings.sent3: The barrelhead of the book club was known for their love of mystery novels.
meanings.sent4: She stood tall and proud, like a barrelhead in a sea of bottles.
meanings.sent5: The barrelhead's speech inspired everyone to work together towards a common goal.
